page.title: 06EARLS COLNE'S MAJORETTES
page.content: The{Earls Colne Majorettes}were formed in 1979,as an all girl baton twirling Majorette troupe.The leader of the troupe is Ian Sparks.In 1984 a mixed marching band of 17 was formed,this together with 41 Majorettes,forms a troupe of 58.The members are 5_18yrs old,and most of them live in Earls Colne.The uniform is a Burgundy leotard and skirt,with a white lanyard,a white hat with a red and white plume.The band wears red,white and blue.The troupe travels in its own double_decker bus,sponsored by local firms.The parents of the girls and boys in the troupe maintain the bus.There are four sections in the Troupe.In 1985 the troupe are performing all over the East of England,they have plans to appear at over thirty displays and competitions.
